original_text: But later, King Cyrus of Babylon commanded that we must build God's temple again. He said this in the first year that he was king.
korean_text: 바벨론 왕 고레스 원년에 고레스 왕이 조서를 내려 하나님의 이 성전을 다시 건축하게 하고

sentences.original_text: that we must build God's temple again.
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 하나님의 성전을 다시 지어야 한다고

sentences.original_text: in the first year that he was king.
